entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
